name: Sticky Situation (alzhang)
description:
Sticky Situation is a 3D puzzle platform game that follows the journey of a spider after his home is destroyed. Shooting your webs will help you navigate the world and solve puzzles.

Credits:

Developers: 

  • Alan Zhang
  • Ge Zhang
  • Nick Presley
  • Qingyue Jiao
  • Zitong Zhao
